item.title: Git Initial Setup
item.author: Author
item.description: How to configure Git Git is a version control system by Linus Torvalds, same person who wrote linux kernel. Installation In Archlinux, you can install git by: 1 $ sudo pacman -S git In Debian and derived distributions: 1 $ sudo apt install -y git Configuration You have to tell git about the author who committed changes so lets do it. Name and Email Tell git about your name and email:
